name: Refuge Recovery World Services
description: Refuge Recovery World Services is a non-profit organization that supports the peer-led movement of using buddhist-inspired practices and principles, combined with successful recovery community structures, to overcome addiction. They offer recovery from all forms of addiction through participation in their Refuge Recovery program.
